name: travel_delays
rows: Road work on I-95 North. The left lane is closed.
Utility work on I-76 eastbound at Exit 347B: PASSYUNK AVE/OREGON AVE. There is a ramp restriction.
Downed utility on MARTINS CREEK BELVIDER HW both directions between SR 0611 SH and MOUNT PLEASANT RD. All lanes closed.
Flooding on SR 1004 SH both directions between POSEYTOWN RD, SCENIC RD and 1 miles EAST of POSEYTOWN RD, SCENIC RD. All lanes closed.
Multi vehicle crash on I-76 eastbound between Exit 346B: GREYS FERRY AVE/UNIVERSITY AVE and Exit 347B: PASSYUNK AVE/OREGON AVE. All lanes now open.
Road work on I-76 East. The right shoulder is closed.
Downed utility on PA 72 both directions between HAMAKER RD and HERNLEY RD. All lanes closed.
Incident on I-476 South. The right shoulder is blocked, expect delays.
Multi vehicle crash on I-95 southbound 1.1 miles south of Exit 26: BETSY ROSS BR/ARAMINGO AVE. There is a lane restriction.
Crash on I-81 northbound 2.5 miles south of Exit 77: PA 39 - MANADA HILL/HERSHEY. There is a shoulder closed.
Debris on roadway on BIGELOW BL eastbound between SEVENTH AV and BIGELOW BL. There is a lane restriction.
Incident on I-76 West. The right lane is blocked, expect delays.
Roadwork on FARMERSVILLE RD both directions between EASTON AV and REXFORD DR. There is a traffic disruption.
Roadwork on I-95 southbound between Exit 26: BETSY ROSS BR/ARAMINGO AVE and Exit 25: ALLEGHENY AVE/CASTOR AVE. There is a lane restriction.
Roadwork on Ramp from I-76 to PA 29.
Utility work on MCKNIGHT RD / EVERGREEN RD northbound between HOUSTON RD and SIEBERT RD. There is a lane restriction.
Road work on I-76 East. The left lane is closed.
I-579 HOV LN / HOV LN TO/FR MELLON AR RD
Roadwork on I-579 HOV LN / HOV LN TO/FR MELLON AR RD both directions between Exit: BEDFORD AV /+ MARIO LEMIEUX PL and Exit: HOV LN TO/FR NORTHSHORE. All lanes closed.
Roadwork on HOV LN TO/FR NORTHSHORE both directions between Exit: MAZEROSKI WY /+ PNC PARK/HEINZ FIELD and Exit: LC TO PERRY HW. All lanes closed.
LITTLE HICKORY RD / NEBRASKA RD / GUITONVILLE RD
Flooding on LITTLE HICKORY RD / NEBRASKA RD / GUITONVILLE RD both directions between GERMAN HILL RD and SR 3005 SAGE RD. All lanes closed.
POPLAR RUN RD / CLINTON RD / WHITE RD / BEAR ROCKS RD
Downed tree in wires on POPLAR RUN RD / CLINTON RD / WHITE RD / BEAR ROCKS RD both directions between PRINKEY RD and DUNBAUGH RD. All lanes closed.
Roadwork on PA 130 westbound 0 miles WEST of CEDAR ST. There is a lane restriction.
Flooding on PA 381 both directions between CLUB STABLE RD and LINCOLN HW. All lanes closed.
Roadwork on I-80 eastbound between .9 miles east of Exit 53: PA 338 - KNOX and .5 miles east of Exit : WEIGH STATION EAST RD. There is a shoulder closed.
Road work on I-76 East. Shoulders are closed.
